name: Battle Store
description:
Did you ever wanted to found your own small street food business in the magical world? This game is going let you do exactly it.

Battle store - IDLE game where you take management of a small street food point under your controll. Watch your employee work, gain money and upgrade your store!

Contains vulgar content and may be unacceptable for some users.

Game features:
- Pixel Graphics
- Cozy Style
- Relaxing Atmoshpere
